thread.section_title: Comfortup Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Comfortup | comfortup.com
thread.title: Richard Forant

author: Richard Forant
title: Richard Forant
text:
I had been researching a mini split heat pump system for some time. Comfortup provided the best pricing and the ability to put together the exact system needed for our home. Once the order was placed, it was shipped quickly and arrived in great shape due to the packaging and palletizing of all the components. I would highly recommend purchasing through Comfortup, and I have.
Richard Forant
